00026 #ifndef DIRECTORYTREECTRL_H
00027 #define DIRECTORYTREECTRL_H
00028 
00029 #include <wx/treectrl.h>
00030 #include <vector>
00031 #include <map>
00032 
00033 #include <common/Path.h>
00034 
00035 
00036 class CDirectoryTreeCtrl : public wxTreeCtrl
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     typedef std::vector<CPath> PathList;
00040     
00041     CDirectoryTreeCtrl(wxWindow* parent, int id, const wxPoint& pos, wxSize siz, int flags);
00042     virtual ~CDirectoryTreeCtrl();
00043 
00044     // get all shared directories
00045     void GetSharedDirectories(PathList* list);
00046     // set list of shared directories
00047     void SetSharedDirectories(PathList* list);
00048     
00049     // User made any changes to list?
00050     bool HasChanged;
00051 
00052     // initialize control
00053     void Init();
00054 
00055 private:
00056     // add a new item
00057     void AddChildItem(wxTreeItemId hBranch, const CPath& item);
00058     // add subdirectory items
00059     void AddSubdirectories(wxTreeItemId hBranch, const CPath& path);
00060     // returns true if folder has at least one subdirectory
00061     bool HasSubdirectories(const CPath& path);
00062     // return the full path of an item (like C:\abc\somewhere\inheaven\)
00063     CPath GetFullPath(wxTreeItemId hItem);
00064     // check status of an item has changed
00065     void CheckChanged(wxTreeItemId hItem, bool bChecked, bool recursed);
00066     // returns true if a subdirectory of strDir is shared
00067     bool HasSharedSubdirectory(const CPath& path);
00068     // set shared directories according to list
00069     void UpdateSharedDirectories();
00070     // when sharing a directory, make all parent directories red
00071     void UpdateParentItems(wxTreeItemId hChild, bool add);
00072     // set color red if there's a shared subdirectory
00073     void SetHasSharedSubdirectory(wxTreeItemId hItem, bool add);
00074 
00075     // share list access
00076     bool IsShared(const CPath& path);
00077     void AddShare(const CPath& path);
00078     void DelShare(const CPath& path);
00079     void MarkChildren(wxTreeItemId hChild, bool mark, bool recursed);
00080     
00081     void OnItemExpanding(wxTreeEvent& evt);
00082     void OnRButtonDown(wxTreeEvent& evt);
00083     void OnItemActivated(wxTreeEvent& evt);
00084 
00085     typedef std::pair<wxString, CPath> SharedMapItem;
00086     typedef std::map<wxString, CPath> SharedMap;
00087     SharedMap m_lstShared;
00088     // get map key from path (normalized path)
00089     wxString GetKey(const CPath& path);
00090 
00091     bool m_IsInit;
00092     // Are we running the remote GUI, and from a remote location?
00093     bool m_IsRemote;
00094     
00095     wxTreeItemId m_root;
00096     
00097     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00098 };
00099 
00100 #undef wxTreeItemId
